item.title: Jim Croce - Time In A Bottle
item.description:
If I could save time
in a bottle
The first thing
that I’d like to do
is to save ev’ryday
till eternity
passes away just
to spend them with you
if I could make days
last forever
If words could make
wishes come true
I’d save ev’ryday
like a treasure
and then again
I would spend them
with you but there
never seems
to be enough time
To do the things
you want to do once
you find them
I’ve looked around
enough to know
that you’re the one
I want to go
thru time
with-

If I had a box
just for wishes
And dreams that
had never come true
The box would be empty
except for the mem’ry
of how they were
answered by you
But there’s never seems
to be enough time
To do the things
you want to do
once you find them
I’ve looked around
enough to know
that you’re the one
I want to go
thru time with-
